description:
Radarr is a movie collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users.

Radarr is a movie collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users.
It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new movies and will interface with clients and indexers to grab, sort, and rename them.
It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of existing files in the library when a better quality format becomes available.
Note that only one type of a given movie is supported.
If you want both an 4k version and 1080p version of a given movie you will need multiple instances.
Changes:
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Sync metadata changes to UI
- Translate metadata settings
- New: Group updates for the same movie for Kodi and Emby / Jellyfin [ #10150 ]
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Fix paths mapping for movie specific translations
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Parse "tmdbid" and "imdb" attributes in Newznab and Torznab parsers
- Save ImdbId for grabbed movie events
- Convert History to TypeScript [ #10230, #10390, #10247 ]
- Fixed: PWA Manifest with URL base [ #10317, #10329 ]
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- Rename 'On Import' to 'On File Import' and 'On Upgrade' to 'On File Upgrade' [ #10164 ]
- Convert Components to TypeScript [ #10378, #10400, #10425 ]
- Convert App to TypeScript [ #10233 ]
- Tooltips for certification and runtime on details page
- Improve warning for missing release dates on movie details page when year is not set [ #10569 ]
- Fallback to text searches for FL only if year is defined
- Bump version to 5.13.1
- Fix stable branch label in update
- Automated API Docs update
- New: Allow major version updates to be installed
- New: Romania and India added to list of Certification Countries
- Natural sorting for tags list in the UI
- New: Sync updates to UI for providers (#10550)
- Fixed: Release Year mandatory to generate valid file formats
- Fixed: Add only movies with release dates from monitored collections
- Multiple Translations updated by Weblate
- New: Parse pt-BR releases as Brazilian Portuguese (#10554)
- Bump dotnet to 6.0.35
- New: Parse ES as Spanish
- Bump version to 5.13.0
